data.title: Land Records
data.text:
If you require technical assistance, please call (203) 652-1376 during regular business hours. For search questions or any additional request, please contact the City Clerk directly at (203) 630-4030

Mandated by Connecticut General Statutes, the City Clerk’s Office is responsible for all land records and land survey maps. The indexing of such records must be kept current instantly, and be available for public inspection during regular working hours.

Fee Schedule for Recording Documents First page $60.00 Subsequent page or portion $5.00 Transfer reportable to the State of Connecticut $2.00/each If mailing address of grantee is not given $1.00 If names of those executing, witnessing and acknowledging are not typed or printed under signature $1.00 Marginal notation of assignment – subsequent to the first two $1.00/each Fee Schedule for Copies and Certified Copies Self-copied $1.00/page Staff copied $1.00/page Certifying documents ($2.00 for certification) $1.00/page
